perturbation.original_text: This Amendment No. 3 (the “Third Amendment”), entered into by and between Stremicks Heritage Foods, LLC (“Heritage”) Premier Nutrition Corporation (“Premier”) is effective as of July 3, 2019 (“Third Amendment Effective Date”) and amends that certain Manufacturing Agreement between Heritage and Premier dated July 1, 2017 as amended (“Agreement”). Heritage and Premier are each referred to herein as a “Party” and collectively as the “Parties.”
perturbation.changed_text: This Amendment No. 3 (the “Third Amendment”), entered into by and between Stremicks Heritage Foods, LLC (“Heritage”) Premier Nutrition Corporation (“Premier”) is effective as of July 3, 2019 (“Third Amendment Effective Date”) and amends that certain Manufacturing Agreement between Heritage and Premier dated July 1, 2017 as amended (“Agreement”). Heritage shall be referred to herein as a “Party” and collectively as the “Parties.”
perturbation.explanation: The original definition includes both Heritage and Premier as a 'Party.' The modified version excludes Premier from being individually defined as a 'Party,' creating ambiguity as to whether all clauses applying to a 'Party' also apply to Premier individually.

perturbation.original_text: Except as otherwise specified above in this Amendment, all other terms, conditions and covenants of the Agreement shall remain in full force and effect.
perturbation.changed_text: Except as otherwise specified above in this Amendment, all other terms, conditions and covenants of the Agreement may remain in full force and effect.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'shall remain' to 'may remain' introduces uncertainty. The original text implies mandatory continuation of the original agreement's terms, whereas the change allows for possible deviation, creating conflict regarding the enforceable terms of the underlying agreement.
